name: RPNG - Random Number Roleplay Generator
description:
Our entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022! The theme was "roll of the dice".

Move and select with A & D, jump with space bar, use skill with 1.

Your "decisions" on what class to play, skill to use and loot to pick up is made by a roll of your decision-die! You can equip new dice, enabling new decisions (like the second class)!

The decision-die persists through death, but your spell die will be lost. Thats right - your spells also roll, and your spell die can also be changed.

This is a roguelike game that features 2 classes, 4 usable skills, 5 levels with "unique" bosses and a total of 14 dice to discover!

(The last level is where mobs fall from the sky, and you cant beat it - or can you? [spoiler: no the boss is invulernable])

Programming: Basboi / Music: Bobolos, Moewe / Art: Basboi, Moewe / flashbunker / moabit 21
